tuv.seg: The Irish Constitution was enacted in 1937
Achtaíodh Bunreacht na hÉireann i 1937
It is the fundamental legal document that sets out how Ireland should be governed through a series of 50 Articles
Is doiciméad dlí bunúsach é a dhéanann cur síos i 50 Alt ar an mbealach ba chóir Éire a rialú
Every part of the Constitution is set out in both the Irish and English language
Leagtar amach gach cuid den Bhunreacht i nGaeilge agus i mBéarla
The Irish title of the Constitution is Bunreacht na hEireann
'Bunreacht na hÉireann' atá mar theideal Gaeilge ar an mBunreacht
The Constitution establishes the branches or organs of government, it establishes the courts and it also sets out how those institutions should be run
Cuireann an Bunreacht brainsí nó orgain an rialtais ar bun, cuireann sé na cúirteanna ar bun, agus leagann sé síos an bealach inar ceart iad a eagrú
The Constitution also describes the fundamental rights of every Irish citizen
Tá feidhm tábhachtach eile ag an mBunreacht; Déanann sé cur síos ar na bunchearta atá ag chuile shaoránach Éireannach
One of the most important Articles of the Constitution is Article 15.4, which states that the Oireachtas must not enact any law that is repugnant to the Constitution and that any such law is invalid

Ceann de na hAilt is tábhachtaí sa Bhunreacht ná Alt 15.4, a shonraíonn nach féidir leis an Oireachtas dlí ar bith a achtú atá aimhréireach leis an mBunreacht agus go bhfuil dlí den sórt sin neamhbhailí
This means that the Constitution is superior to all other law
Ciallaíonn sé seo go bhfuil forlámhas ag dlí an Bhunreachta ar gach dlí eile lena n-áirítear reachtaíocht
If a proposed new law is repugnant to the Constitution, it cannot be enacted without first changing the Constitution by a constitutional referendum
Má bhíonn dlí nua-mholta aimhréireach leis an mBunreacht, ní féidir é a achtú gan an Bunreacht a athrú i dtús báire trí reifreann bunreachtúil
The Constitution consists of 2 main parts
Tá 2 phríomhchuid sa Bhunreacht
• The fundamental rights of the citizen
• Cearta bunúsacha an tsaoránaigh
Read more about how an amendment of the Constitution is made and what happens where unconstitutional legislation and decisions arise
Léigh tuilleadh faoin mbealach a dhéantar leasú Bunreachta agus cad a tharlaíonn in Éirinn maidir le cinntí agus reachtaíocht mhíbhunreachtúil
